mapper.select: select level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from goods_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_goods(gdsCode, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsDesc) values(#{gdsCode}, #{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsDesc})
mapper.select: select gdsCode, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsDesc, gdsImg, gdsDate from tbl_goods order by gdsDate desc
